ygData.subject: Re: Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Probably someone meant to sell a normal lambent stone they were carrying and accidently sold the fire opal lambent without realizing it.  I ve done dumber
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 5 Jan 2000, RaceFace wrote:
>
> :) For my 2nd bracer, though, I didn't need to buy the fire opals, as
> someone had sold a lambent fire opal to a merchant near the bank in
> Freeport, which I was able to purchase for 105pp. Saved myself 5pp and a
> lambent stone. :) I still have no idea why they sold it to the merchant,
> though I'm glad they did. :)

Probably someone meant to sell a normal lambent stone they
were carrying and accidently sold the fire opal lambent
without realizing it. I've done dumber things (gave away a
crystalline blade while distributing FS weapon loot to better
fit in everyone's weight allowances, sold that ranger sword
from LGuk to a merchant). The graphics on these rare and
expensive items are the same as the "normal" items.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
